task6

Class Transaction

  • java.lang.Object
    • task6.Transaction

  • public class Transaction
extends java.lang.Object
    Defines the details of a transaction, which includes the money tendered and the product as it is being built.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Transaction()
      Creates a transaction with no money tendered.
      Transaction(Money moneyTendered)
      Creates a transaction with money already tendered.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Money addMoneyTendered(A_Currency money)
      Adds money to this transaction.
      A_Ingredient getIngredientOuter()
      Gets the outer ingredient layer of the product as it is being built.
      Money getMoneyTendered()
      Gets the money added to this transaction.
      Money getProductCost()
      Returns the total cost of the product being built.
      boolean hasIngredientOuter()
      Returns whether there is a product being built.
      java.lang.String toString()
      Gets the string representation of this transaction in the form: moneyTendered=moneyTendered ingredientOuter=ingredientOuter
      java.util.List<A_Ingredient> unrollProduct()
      Gets a list of ingredients in this product from the outer through the inner.
      void updateIngredientOuter(A_Ingredient ingredient)
      Records the outer ingredient layer of the product as it is being built.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, wait, wait, wait

      • updateIngredientOuter

        public void updateIngredientOuter(A_Ingredient ingredient)
        Records the outer ingredient layer of the product as it is being built. This must be called with every new layer.
        Parameters:
        ingredient - - the ingredient wrapping the previous outer layer, or the first ingredient
